person_say: I’m about to give an important presentation, but I’m really nervous. Do you have any tips for relaxation and focus?
animal_say: Nervousness is totally normal! There's a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn some relaxation techniques from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will share some calming relaxation techniques to help you shine in your presentation!
